name: Viva la robolución!
description:
This is our entry for Godot Wild Jam 22.

It is still a sort of draft as we had problems with a team that slowly disappeared.

To play the game use the marketplace on the right of the game screen.

As of now you can purchase only one type of turrets.

Drag them on the map to buy them

Place them on the road, rotate them using right click.

When you are ready click on the button to unleash the robot revolution.

The brave team that sticked to the project and made this possible:

Oscar Barroso (Game design, art, music)

Roba (art)

Saba (art, programming)

Gioele Santi (programming)
